description:
Can run the QT wallet or daemon.
denarius - runs the QT Wallet
denarius.daemon - runs the wallet daemon

One of the better snaps on the store.
This cryptocurrency is far superior to Bitcoin and features IPFS tools, It is so fast!

syncing is takig a while.on wifi 400kb/sec , a compressed donwloadable verion would be nice on 600kb+ offering

trying to learn simple commands in console.
is there a simple line for wkr name or wallet name and pool address intended soon??

cant boot up Denarius wallet, so i tried to bootup in snap..manually via terminal
same error
 but with error paths visible in terminal:

/snap/denarius$ denarius
Qt: Session management error: None of the authentication protocols specified are supported
libGL error: MESA-LOADER: failed to retrieve device information
libGL error: Version 4 or later of flush extension not found
libGL error: failed to load driver: i915
libGL error: MESA-LOADER: failed to retrieve device information
QNetworkManagerInterface::QNetworkManagerInterface(QObject*) propsReply "An AppArmor policy prevents this sender from sending this message to this recipient; type=\"method_call\", sender=\":1.125\" (uid=1000 pid=4484 comm=\"/snap/denarius/181/bin/Denarius \" label=\"snap.denarius.denarius (enforce)\") interface=\"org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties\" member=\"GetAll\" error name=\"(unset)\" requested_reply=\"0\" destination=\"org.freedesktop.NetworkManager\" (uid=0 pid=885 comm=\"/usr/sbin/NetworkManager --no-daemon \" label=\"unconfined\")"
QNetworkManagerInterface::QNetworkManagerInterface(QObject*) nmReply "An AppArmor policy prevents this sender from sending this message to this recipient; type=\"method_call\", sender=\":1.125\" (uid=1000 pid=4484 comm=\"/snap/denarius/181/bin/Denarius \" label=\"snap.denarius.denarius (enforce)\") interface=\"org.freedesktop.NetworkManager\" member=\"GetDevices\" error name=\"(unset)\" requested_reply=\"0\" destination=\"org.freedesktop.NetworkManager\" (uid=0 pid=885 comm=\"/usr/sbin/NetworkManager --no-daemon \" label=\"unconfined\")"
"Object path cannot be empty"

any could help

anyhelp recovering would be nice
easy mining many coins so I like
Let it sync for a three day weekend then when I got back it stopped syncing saying 16 minutes to go.
